ActSpecial Appointment Regulations, No. 2005-13
PrecisAppointment of the HONOURABLE BOB RAE, P.C., of Toronto, Ontario, to the position of Independent Counsellor to the Prime Minister, styled the Chairperson of the Air India Flight 182 Review and Inquiry, to hold office during pleasure for a term ending March 31, 2007.
